content.rendered:
WEDDING

IDEAS & ADVICE

WEDDING

IDEAS & ADVICE

The Top Wedding Trends of 2024

From unconventional venues to rich color palettes, here’s a look at 2024 wedding trends.

How to Have an Eras-Inspired Wedding: Folklore Edition

Calling all Taylor Swift stans, here’s our take on how to have a Folklore Era-inspired wedding.

Answering Our Most Frequently Asked Questions

Commonly-asked wedding planning questions, answered.

How to Have an Eras-Inspired Wedding: Lover Edition

Taylor Swift stan? Here’s our take on how to have a Lover Era-inspired wedding ceremony and reception.

How to Have a Daisy Jones-Inspired Wedding

Get inspired by Daisy Jones & the Six and plan your own retro bohemian wedding.

Unlocking Your Wedding Design Style: A Comprehensive Guide

Eight tips on how to find your wedding design style with inspiration from real weddings.

2023 Wedding Trend Predictions

The top 10 wedding trends we think you’ll see more of in 2023.

The Fascinating Origins Behind ‘Something Old, Something New, Something Borrowed, and Something Blue’

The history of something old, something new, something borrowed, and something blue.

Unveiling the Best: Currently Crushing on Unique Vendors

From live painters to custom experiences, see some of the best unique wedding vendors.

Discover the Latest Trend: Custom Signage Inspirations

The 2022 wedding trend we are currently crushing: custom signage.

7 Alternative Wedding Ceremony Ideas

Take a look at our seven favorite alternative wedding ceremony ideas to change things up.

How to Have a Bridgerton-Inspired Wedding

Dear reader, here are six ways to create a Bridgerton-inspired wedding, from the florals to the your fashion.

Top Considerations for Planning Your Perfect Summer Wedding

From choosing a seasonal menu to planning for the heat, here are 5 things you need to know for a summer wedding.

Feature Friday: Larson Floral Co.

Learn more about Nashville florist, Larson Floral Co., as part of our Feature Friday series.

Nashville Destination Wedding Guide: Your Ultimate Resource for Saying ‘I Do’ in Music City

The best places to stay, eat, and get married if you’re having a destination wedding in Nashville.

Currently Crushing: Velvet in Weddings

All the ways couples are incorporating velvet into their wedding decor and attire.

2022 Wedding Fashion Trends & Predictions

Wedding fashion predictions for 2022 from real weddings at The Bell Tower and The Bridge Building.

5 Reasons to Hire a Wedding Planner

Here are the top five reasons you should hire a wedding planner.

Expert Tips for Safely Planning Your Corporate Event

Tips and advice for planning a safe corporate event during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Currently Crushing: Unique Florals

Dive in to some of our favorite, unique wedding flower trends from real weddings.

Five Things to Remember on Your Wedding Day

Five things to remember on your wedding day by Infinity Hospitality.

10 Questions to Ask While Looking for A Venue

We created a list of 10 important questions you should ask while you shop for a venue.

6 Ways Couples Are Breaking Wedding Traditions

Couples put their own spin on longstanding traditions from alternative ceremonies to wedding day fashion.

A Guide to Inclusive Wedding Planning

We’re sharing simple tips for couples who want to plan a more inclusive and modern wedding celebration.

LOAD MORE

excerpt.rendered: Y’ALL MEANS ALL PLANNING TIPS FOR INCLUSIVE WEDDINGS Here at Infinity, we’re passionate about helping couples plan a celebration of their love and commitment to one another. The days of traditional, one-size-fits-all weddings are long gone (good riddance!), and we’re here to offer a little advice for couples looking for more inclusive ceremonies and receptions. […]
